text: Ingrassia is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Angelo Ingrassia, (1923–2013), American jurist *Anthony Ingrassia (1944–1995), American theatre director, producer and playwright *Ciccio Ingrassia, (1922–2003), Italian actor, comedian and film director *Frankie Ingrassia, American actress *Giovanni Filippo Ingrassia (1510–1580), Italian physician and anatomist *Giuseppe Ingrassia, (born 1988), Italian footballer *Julien Ingrassia, (born 1979), French rally co-driver *Paul Ingrassia, (born 1950), American journalist *John Ingrassia, (born 1967), American lawyer Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Ingrassia
